text:
The mod_access documentation has a trivially easy to fix bug. SetEnvIf takes a regex, so the '.' needs to be quoted in the example: 
SetEnvIf User-Agent ^KnockKnock/2.0 let_me_in
<Directory /docroot>
    Order Deny,Allow
    Deny from all
    Allow from env=let_me_in
</Directory>
Don't forget to update the Japanese translation at the same time. Thanks!
